attributes.action: Free Sarah Sands or at least allow her orginal sentence
attributes.additional_details: Because of 30 members of the public complaining Sarah had to go back a court of appeal and her sentence has now been changed to seven and a half years. Firstly this mother handed herself in to the police and Mike had previous convictions and was on bail. How is this fair!
attributes.background: Sarah was sentenced to three and a half years for fatally stabbing a convicted paedophile Mike Pleasted 77, 28th November 2014. Her sentence has now been changed to seven and a half years

rejection.details:
This is a decision taken by the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

If you would like the law to be changed, to provide for a lower minimum sentence in cases like this, you could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law.
